element.label: ClinicalSynopsisItem
element.definition: Narrative summary or overview about a patient and their health situation, from the perspective of a healthcare provider

element.label: Synopsis
element.definition: The summary, assessment, conclusions or evaluation of the clinical findings.

element.label: AnatomicalLocationItem
element.definition: A single physical site on or within the human body.

element.label: BodySiteName
element.definition: Identification of a single physical site either on, or within, the human body.

element.label: Laterality
element.definition: The side of the body where the problem or diagnosis is located.
